dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text: I THINK YOU SHOULD SEE A LAWYER BEFORE UNLEASHING THIS NEW INVENTION ON MANKIND.

dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text: ...I'M AFRAID MY NEW INVENTION WILL EXPOSE ME TO LOTS OF LAWSUITS.

dialogue.speaker: Dilbert
dialogue.text: NO. SOUNDS LIKE I CAN MAKE MORE MONEY BY SUING YOU.
